code: import*as types from'../actions/actionsType';export default(function(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:'';var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case types.ADD_LOADING_ITEM:return state+1;case types.REMOVE_LOADING_ITEM:return state-1;default:return state;}});
